featured.text: In fact, this seems so common that the Japanese now have a term for it: bura- hara, meaning blood-type harassment.

definition.zh_def: 騷擾，指對某人進行持續的、不受歡迎的行為或言語，造成其困擾或恐懼。
definition.en_def: Harassment refers to unwanted and aggressive behavior towards an individual, causing them distress or fear.
definition.example: She reported the harassment to her supervisor immediately.
